_comment: IMPORTANT: RfidPrefix must be entered in REVERSE BYTE ORDER
_comment2: Example: If your Tonie tags end with ED0E, enter 0EED here
_comment3: The 4-character prefix will be prepended to the user's 4-character input,
_comment4: then the entire 8-character string will be reversed to create the directory name.
_comment5: AudioIdPrompt: Set to true to prompt for custom Audio ID (advanced users only)
_comment6: AudioIdPrompt: Set to false to auto-generate Audio ID (recommended for most users)
